The Library holds book information that has been inputted by anyone. The books submitted will always be here. Feel free to add your own books with the form above.

F.A.Q.
Want to add a book? Use the form above to input your book's information. Please make sure the title is correct. When you click submit, your book will be added to The Library along with a Google search link to further information about your book.

See a mistake? Click on the edit button on the top right of each card. The form above will fill with the provided information. You can change anything from there.

Found spam? Books can be deleted by clicking on the X button on the top left of each card. Be careful! Once you click that button, the book is deleted forever (until someone adds it back to The Library).

Found a bug? If you've found something wrong with the app or have an idea for new/better features, feel free to submit your issues here.
